description: This three hour course is an introduction to the concepts needed by both new users, and site owners and power users, to manage a SharePoint site including: creating and working with lists, libraries, and site pages; using views and workflows; working with web parts on a page; granting users permission to use a site; and over-riding inherited permissions for lists or libraries. Materials included are instructional videos, along with downloadable student data files.
title: SharePoint 2013
